Pullman Luang Prabang Surrounded by verdant mountains and rice paddies, Pullman Luang Prabang is a luxurious resort offering an escape into nature. The resort features spacious rooms and private villas with balconies, three outdoor pools, and a spa. Guests can savor gourmet Lao and international cuisine at the on-site restaurant or explore nearby attractions, including the Kuang Si Falls and Luang Prabang's UNESCO-listed Old Town. Combining modern luxury with natural beauty, Pullman Luang Prabang offers a truly unforgettable experience.
